message:
Greetings from Technology Students' Gymkhana!

The Smart India Hackathon (SIH) was a national level effort connecting the higher education campuses. The SIH was primarily a code-fest in which software programmers were challenged to write programmes giving innovative solutions to more than 500 problem statements. The SIH-2017 elicited an enthusiastic response with more than 40,000 students participating. It was concluded in the first week of April 2017 with Hon’ble PM addressing the participants. This is being followed with Smart India Hackathon-2018 which was formally launched details of which can be found in https://innovate.mygov.in/sih2018/.

The MHRD now proposes to expand the scope of SIH-2018 by including hardware section in it. This platform will provide an opportunity to the innovative minds to showcase their solutions at the national level. It is also proposed that the best entries at the national level would also be provided funding through the Research Parks and the Technology Business Incubators (TBIs) for product development for their eventual commercialisation/extensive social use.

The MHRD expects a good participation in this Hackathon from all the IITs and NITs.
All students are requested to provide ideas (with or without models/prototypes) that will be proposed as problem statements of the Smart India Hackathon 2018. This should be done by mailing the idea totech.gymkhana@gmail.com by 13th November, 2 AM.

You are also requested to go through the 400+ problem statements provided in the aforementioned link and register for the Hackathon. The problem statements are both software and hardware based.

#Go_For_Gold

Inter IIT Tech Meet 2018

Applications are invited for 2 new events:
1. Hackathon 
Event Details: Will be disclosed on-the-spot. Knowledge of orbital mechanics (astronomy) and good programming skills will be useful

2. Case Study
Event Details: Will be disclosed on-the-spot.

Send in your applications (CVs with valid proof of credentials) at tech.gymkhana@gmail.com mentioning the name of the event in the subject. Provision of contact details is mandatory.

Deadline: 1st November, 12 AM

The rules have been provided in the Drive Link.

Submissions have to be done to tech.gymkhana@gmail.com

Mail Subject: Case Study <Team Name>
File Name: <Team Name>
There will be no presentation.

Contact General Secretary, Technology of your respective Hall of Residence for further information.

Technology Students' Gymkhana is organising Open IIT Code Conclave 2017 on 15th October 2017.
Duration: 1 hour
Timing: Between 4-6 PM

Register here: www.tinyurl.com/openiitcc

The format will be that of an online quiz. You can take it from anywhere.
Exciting goodies to be won!

6TH INTER IIT TECH MEET

The 6th Inter IIT Tech Meet will be held from 05.01.2018 to 07.01.2018 at IIT Madras.

The problem statements for the events have been released and can be found in the link below. Please go through them and send in your applications (CV and cover letter along with valid proof) at tech.gymkhana@gmail.com.

The subject of the mail should be [Problem Statement][Name][Roll No.].

Deadline: 03.10.2017, 12.30 AM

No applications after this deadline will be accepted under any circumstances.

Technology, IIT Kharagpur congratulates all the winners!

Open IIT 2017-18 | Product Design

The results are as follows:-
1st - Team Enigma (50.5 marks)
2nd - Team Shunya (49 marks)
3rd - Team Mosquiteers (46.5 marks)

story: Technology, IIT Kharagpur added 50 new photos to the album: Gymkhana Awards 2016-2017 — with Anusha Sharan and Anmol Shakya.
message:
The Annual Gymkhana Award Ceremony was held on the 18th of April at the Netaji Auditorium.

The ceremony saw the winners of the Gymkhana Awards in Technology, the 5th Inter IIT Tech Meet and the Technology General Championship being felicitated for their efforts and excellence.

The Technology Students' Gymkhana would like to congratulate all the awardees, and wishes them all the best for their future.

story: Technology, IIT Kharagpur added 50 new photos to the album: Gymkhana Awards 2016-2017 — with Anusha Sharan and Anmol Shakya.
message:
The Annual Gymkhana Award Ceremony was held on the 18th of April at the Netaji Auditorium.

The ceremony saw the winners of the Gymkhana Awards in Technology, the 5th Inter IIT Tech Meet and the Technology General Championship being felicitated for their efforts and excellence.

The Technology Students' Gymkhana would like to congratulate all the awardees, and wishes them all the best for their future.

Following is the list of Gymkhana Awardees in the Technology category for the academic session 2016-2017.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

Following is the list of Gymkhana Awardees in the Technology category for the academic session 2016-2017.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

Gymkhana awards 2016 - 2017

Application for the gymkhana awards in the genre of technology are invited for
1) Prof. G S Sanyal Cup.
2) Order of merit.
3) Hon'ble mention.
4) Ashoke Mukherjee Cup (Outgoing student who has made outstanding voluntary contribution to the Gymkhana)
CVs should be emailed to tech.gymkhana@gmail.com by 11/04/2017 at 6 pm. All the relevant documents (supporting points mentioned in the CV) should be mailed along with the CV.
In the resumes following information can be included:
*Participation in the GC.
*Position of responsibilities.
*Participation in tech events (eg. KTJ, out station participation).
*Inter IIT Tech achievements. 
*Meaningful projects and technical papers.
*National/International conferences.
Regards

The details are mentioned here - (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mvS6uhweW0u5G9ItWUaUTf3CvyqITRL69ibjjymRx3I/edit?usp=sharing).Please mail your usernames to codeconclave@gmail.com before Friday 11:45 PM.Exciting goodies for the top 10 students!!

AFTER THE HUGE SUCCESS OF NAVARACHANAA 2016
We are back to have the same technical blast as we had done in the 2016.
So here we introduce the National level project competition
*NAVARACHANAA-2017* from* 30th March, 2017* to *31st March, 2017 *with
themes,
1) Digital India 
2) Make in India
3) Skill India/ Startup India
4) Smart city
5) Swachh Bharat Abhiyan
6)General Category
We are glade to invite you for this phenomenal opportunity to showcase your
ideas and Implementation as a cherishing outcome in the contribution to the
Nation's Dream.
For further Details:-
navarachanaa@svvv.edu.in
